intro: The ultimate recycling business challenge awaits you.
description:
In Recycling Station Simulator, one man's trash is your golden ticket. Start your journey as a lone junk scavenger and transform your humble beginnings into a full-scale recycling empire. Scour abandoned lots and city streets for plastic, metal, glass, wood, and paper — then sort, process, and sell it for profit. Upgrade your gear, hire workers, strike deals, and take control of an ever-growing operation.

But success doesn’t come easy. You'll need to negotiate contracts, hack into locked buildings for hidden cash, manage your finances carefully — and even grab a few hours of sleep to stay on your feet. Every penny counts, and every decision shapes your future.

Key Features:
- Collect & Recycle: Explore different areas to gather materials and process them into sellable cubes.
- Run the Base: Sort waste, operate machines, improve your equipment, and automate your systems.
- Trade & Negotiate: Master the art of the deal. Sell to clients or sign lucrative contracts for bigger profits.
- Upgrade & Expand: Hire helpers, boost efficiency, and expand your base into an industrial powerhouse.
- Explore & Hack: Buy lockpicks, break into forgotten places, and uncover stashes of cash.
- Financial Survival: Take loans, manage expenses, and make sure to pay your debts on time.
- Rest & Recharge: Don’t burn out — sleep to regain energy and keep the business running.

Can you rise from rags to riches and build a world-class recycling operation?
The trash pile is waiting. Dive in.
